string-array.name: response_to_easy_questions
string-array.item: Why not do it yourself? Oh I know; you\'re testing me.
Maybe you\'ve already got it while typing.

string-array.name: response_again_to_easy_questions
string-array.item: Hey I\'ve told you THIS IS SO EASY!!
Erhhh I\'m rusted... Come with tougher one next time plz!

string-array.name: response_to_hard_questions
string-array.item: This is a little bit hard... Here you go.
Thank you for this one; and here\'s the answer.
Well, actually this one is also no hard for me:-)

string-array.name: response_common
string-array.item: See? I got it so fast!
